page.title: 17Clubs and Social Activities
page.content: {The Playgroup}meets in the Village Hall 3 mornings a week when about 20 children aged 2 _ 5 years meet to play with modelling dough, sand etc There is a {Mother and Toddler group} which meets on Tuesday mornings. {The Brownies}meet on Tuesdays in Studham village hall. There are 16 girls aged 7-11 years. {The Scout Group}was started in 1955 in Austin Glover's garage but now meets weekly in the Scout Hut on the Playing Field. The hut is also used by the 16 boys of the {Cubs pack. { The Dunstable District Venture} {Scouts}(Bailetta) for girls and boys aged 15-20 years from neighbouring villages meet on Thursdays. {The Studham Girl Guides} meet once a week in Kensworth Village Hall.
